snippet: A not guilty plea was entered on Friday on behalf of Beverly Hall, a former superintendent of Atlanta Public Schools, who is charged in a conspiracy case that accuses educators of cheating on standardized tests.
abstract: Not guilty plea is entered on behalf of Beverly Hall, former superintendent of Atlanta Public Schools, who is charged in broad conspiracy case that accuses educators of cheating on standardized tests.
lead_paragraph: A not guilty plea was entered on Friday on behalf of Beverly Hall, a former superintendent of Atlanta Public Schools, who is charged in a conspiracy case that accuses educators of cheating on standardized tests.

headline.main: Georgia: Not Guilty Plea for Ex-Schools Chief
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Not Guilty Plea For Ex-Schools Chief
